main event: A bright ball of fire, red with blue lighting surrounding it, was observed in Kettering, Ohio in July 1960.
interesting points: The object disappeared behind a tree,The sighting lasted for about 2-5 seconds,Weather conditions were clear with good visibility,The report suggests the sighting could have been a meteor based on description,The observer believed it was a natural phenomenon yet labeled as a UFO.
witness description: The observer reported seeing the object while looking east from a house.
